welcome_message_body: Welcome to La Paz, Bolivia! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and bustling markets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that La Paz has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Panadería Beneite
restaurants.description: Panadería Beneite is a bakery located in Argentina, Mendoza.
restaurants.address: Independencia (Av. San Martin), 5590 Argentina, Mendoza, Mendoza, La Paz

restaurants.name: DejaVu
restaurants.description: DejaVu is a american restaurant located in La Paz.

restaurants.name: Parador La Paz
restaurants.description: Parador La Paz is a sandwich spot located in La Paz.
restaurants.address: Av. 25 De Mayo (Sarmiento), 5590 La Paz, Mendoza

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Alto Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Alto Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
